text: Bouvelinghem is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region in northern France. ==Geography== A village situated 10 miles (16 km) west of Saint-Omer, on the D208 road. It was completely destroyed by fire in 1876. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of the Assumption, dating from the early 20th century. * The ruins of a chateau. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bouvelinghem
